related_questions.question: How much do Apple store employees make?
related_questions.snippet: Apple - Retail Salaries in the United States The average Apple salary ranges from approximately $30,131 per year for Inventory Specialist to $110,250 per year for Merchandiser. Average Apple hourly pay ranges from approximately $14.41 per hour for Retail Sales Associate to $68.00 per hour for Store Manager.
related_questions.title: How much do Apple Retail jobs pay? | Indeed.com

related_questions.question: How do you get a job at the Apple Store?
related_questions.snippet: How To Get Hired At An Apple StoreSmile and be friendly to everyone. ... Demonstrate passion. ... Don't worry about not knowing much about Apple products. ... Speak up and demonstrate confidence. ... Interact with the group and ask for help. ... Show a commitment to the customer. ... Talk with humility about your success in a previous job.Apr 3, 2012
related_questions.title: How To Get Hired At An Apple Store - Forbes

related_questions.question: Can I work for Apple from home?
related_questions.snippet: Apple Is Hiring, and You Can Work From Home. ... "If it sounds casual, make no mistake -- this is a professional role," Apple writes. Applicants should have a "quiet, distraction-free work space with a door you can shut, an ergonomic chair, a desk … and your own network connection," Apple advises.Jan 17, 2018
related_questions.title: Apple Is Hiring, and You Can Work From Home - Entrepreneur

related_questions.question: How much does an apple at home advisor make?
related_questions.snippet: In November 2018, Glassdoor.com reported that "the national average salary for an Apple At Home Advisor is $30,540 in United States". Others have reported an hourly wage of anywhere between $13 to $16 an hour.
related_questions.title: Working as an Apple At Home Advisor - The Balance Careers
